item.text: @#/ /rgyud 'bum da pa bzhugs so/ /
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra pA Ni a b+hi She ka ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po rnam par smin pa bsam gyis
mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rin po che'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu rnam par spras pa'i khang bzang chen po rin po che'i rgyal po/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khang pa na/ pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po/ nor bu chen po dbang gi rgyal pos ngos gnyis rnam par spras pa la bzhugs nas/

lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni nam thang ba'i nam mkha' la lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri

chen po de la lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos kun nas bskor te sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/ sku dang gsung dang thugs ni mnyam par byin gyis brlabs/

g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang ni bral zhing lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing / 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / ngag mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs

dang / de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob

ste/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang

chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston pa dag mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang

la la dag /me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam du ma nges par ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang / sa bsgrub pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis so/ /mdor na sems can gang la la dag dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa de dag

thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pas bsdus pa sha stag ste/ de dag ni rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de

dag nyid kyis dge ba mngon par 'du byed do/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes chen po shin tu rgyas pa de thams cad mthong zhing 'jug ste/ rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems te/ dge ba ci tsam mngon par 'du byed pa yang rgyu

de nyid dang dmigs pa de nyid kyis so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar rmad du byung zhing / ya mtshan gyis 'dun pa'i snying du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam ste cang mi smra bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par blta

zhing nye bar sems so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ya mtshan gyi sa snying 'dun pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer stong phrag du ma mgur nas phyung

ngo / /de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad snang bar byas te/ nam mkha'i khams rab 'byam dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dbang dang ldan par gyur pa 'khod pa de dag la/ thams cad mkhyen pa

rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bcom ldan rims nad bral ba de/ /dbang sgyur rgyal po'i khang pa ni/ /skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na/ /snying 'thad chen po seng ge'i khri/ /dpag tshad sum brgya yod pa la/ /pad+ma'i snying po der bzhugs nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams

kyis bskor/ /gnas der thub pa chen po yis/ /bkod pa chen por gang sprul pa/ /de dag gi ni grangs tshad dang / /dbyibs dang kha dog gang yin pa/ /de ni bskal pa grangs med du/ /bstan par nus pa ma yin no/ /de ru ded la dpa' bo che/ /rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /yid gnyis som nyi spangs pa po/ /dogs pa gcod pa blta bar gyis/ /zhes bskul to/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bskul nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mgur

du rang gi gnas su bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mdzod spu nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba 'khor 'od zer brgya stong dang ldan pa phyung ste/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ 'dren pa bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la/ /blta ba dang ni mchod pa bgyi ba dang / /sems can phan par bzhed pas chos brjod phyir/ /khyed cag thams cad ma shol 'dir gshegs shig /ces yang dag par ston to/ /de

nas 'od zer de dag yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'od zer des bskul ma thag tu/ rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/

bcom ldan 'das dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen por mchi na/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen

po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig na mchis/ gang du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags zhes zhus so/ /de skad ces

gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa

zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam du ma nges par ston pa dag yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam re re nges par ston pa re re la yang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod pa rab 'byam du ma yod par khong du chud par bya'o/ /rigs

kyi bu dag de la mtshams sbyor ba bkod pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dag gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams kyi khongs su

'dus shing rjes su zhugs par gcig go/ /me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa rab 'byam gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud

gcig go/ /me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya rnams gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bar ma gcig go/ /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam bar ma bkod pa'i rgyud

bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig ste/ de ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad des/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yongs su sbyongs so/ /rigs kyi

bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig po de nyid/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de nyid yin te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs

su bskor/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las ni shin tu 'das shing nam mkha' nyid byang chub kyi snying por byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma de na rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na bzhugs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad

de ni de 'dra ste/ de'i yon tan nam/ spyod pa'am/ smon lam mam/ ye shes kyi mtha' ni nged kyis bskal pa grangs med par yang rtogs par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag

ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud de/ nged ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa gzo ba byas pa shes pa sha stag go/ /rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sngon gyi spyod pa dang smon lam dang ngag gi 'khor lo'i

dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gcod pa nas brtsams te/ bstan pa gnas par mdzad pa dang theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang / ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byin

gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las brtsams te/ ngag sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rab 'byam go bar mdzad par bzhed nas/ 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po 'di phyung ngo / /de

nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen tog gis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros la/ rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di byin no/ /na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA dza na/ rigs

kyi bu khyod rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyis shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag

du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rin po che rdo rje chen po la snying po 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen po sngon ma mthong ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog

gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po yang rin po che dang rdo rje me tog gi sprin chen pos mngon par bkab bo/ /de bzhin du bdug

pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje'i sprin chen po dag gis bkab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der yang song nas/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar phyogs nyid du gnas te/ rin po che dang rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po dang rin po che'i rgyal po chen po dang rdo rje'i dbyug gu

dang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che rdo rje chen po'i yi ge'i snying po'i yi ge'i snying pos phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing bzhugs so/ /lho phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ rdo rje chen po'i snying po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der/

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang blta ba dang mchod pa'i phyir song shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos/ rdo rje chen po'i

snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba ma hA badzrA gra ba ra~M hU~M/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdo rje mchog gi snying po 'di thob cing / bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag

du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba de dang / rgyal po dbang

sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad rin po che rdo rje mchog gi snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so/ /rdo rje chen po'i mchog gi me tog dang / bdug pa dang /

spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / rdo rje chen po'i mchog dang / rin po che mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bas rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po snang bar byas so/ /mchog

sbyin pa chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi sgras phyogs bcur go bar byas so/ /go bar byas nas kyang ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lho phyogs nyid du gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rdo rje chen po'i mchog las byung ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po

rnams la 'dug go/ /nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog /rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i mchog gi snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis/ rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma mchog

gi dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA ka ru Na ba la badzra pad+mA gra sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis snying po da'i gsungs

nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun

du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der

song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma chen po rdo rje'i rgyal po la 'dug ste/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po 'di thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams me

tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa thams cad du thugs rje chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyis rang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyi sprin rnams kyis kun tu bkang nas snang bar byas so/ /byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la/ rdo rje chen pos rnam par gnon pa rdo rje chen pos rnam par rol pa/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas/ byang chub kyi snying po chen po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA bar da man ra a gri gri/ 'di gsungs nas

byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo / /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig

rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang

phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i rgyan bkod par byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mchog gi lus kyi sprin rnams kyis phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che cod pan la/ dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis/ dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaH sa rba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA oM oM dza~M sa~M/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi

gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i cod pan/ bcom ldan 'das des

nang bas 'jigs rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi

zhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas dkon mchog gsum gyir rdo rjes

rgyan pa'i pad+ma'i rgyal po la 'dug ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sku'i sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs so/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po la sprin chen po rdo rje'i mchog bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

sprin gyi dpal gyis sprin chen po rdo rje'i mchog bkod pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA ma hA badzra me g+ha bi kr-I Di te bi shwa sam b+ha ba ha/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa

de dang rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems

dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa

bzhin du/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas sprin chen po rdo rje mchog gi lus kyi rnam par rig pa'i sprin rnams kyis pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po'i sprin byin gyis brlabs nas/ mchod pa chen po'i mchog gi sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par

'gengs shing 'dug go/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yag dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje chen po'i tog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dpa' bo la rdo rje las byung ba'i snying po sbyin par

mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i tog gis/ rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA badzrod+d+hu be swA hA/ 'di byin nas

btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dpa' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de

dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba

byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs ba bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas/ rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i rgyan rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / rdo rje'i gzugs kyis brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go/ /nub

byang gi phyogs mtshams nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs snyan pas byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pas/ rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra rak+Sha ni R+g+ho Sha bi krAn+ta swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo / /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brug sgra'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ ji

ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas te/ dbyangs kyi rig byed mtha' yas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad go bar byed cing / rang gi smon lam las nges par byung ba'i rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go /'og gi phyogs

nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par dag pa'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i yan lag la spyod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maH

sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA ha~M he swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i yan lag bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba

phrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po

la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nyid du

gnas nas/ pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs pa dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing / pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'dug go /steng gi phyogs nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal pa'i 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po sbyin pa mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA bo d+h+yaM ka ra d+har+m+ma swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das

des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi

gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan

brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas te ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du steng gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mtha' yas pa go bar byed pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / chos nyid las byung ba'i pad+ma chen

po la 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus shing / 'khod pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing 'di dag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo / /

com ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing / nam mkha' ltar gdod ma nas zhi ba dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po ltar bsam pa thams cad

yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yang mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sgra skad gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o/ /gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa/ /mgon po rmad byung dam pa 'di/ /ci ltar sa la snang zhig

gu/ /sku yis 'phrin las mi mdzad la/ /gsung dang thugs kyis mi mdzad cing / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ /shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra/ /sku yis sems can thams cad la/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnams mdzad kyang / /sku la

'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ /thub pa de ni 'gyur mi mnga'/ /gsung ni brag cha 'dra ba ste/ /bstan du med cing gzugs med kyang / /lha yi rnga chen ci bzhin du/ /'gro ba thams cad tshim par mdzad/ /thugs ni rlom sems bral ba ste/ /de la yul

ni mnga' ma lags/ /yul rnams dang ni de bral yang / /sems can rnams kyi yul du gyur/ /gsung ni de bzhin sems can de/ /de bzhin sku dang de bzhin thugs/ /mtshan nyid gcig dang rab ldan zhing / /smra ba'i nang na mchog tu snang / /

skye ba med las grol ba yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yod min pas/ /gang dag skye ba med shes pa/ /de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes/ /mgon po rtag tu mnyam gzhag cing / /lus dang ngag dang yid bral yang / /rtag par lus ngag spyod yul du/ /thub pa

rgyun du rab tu snang / /byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid/ /shin tu dka' ba byed pa dag /sangs rgyas ye shes che 'bar ba/ /'di 'dra yongs su tshol bar byed/ /de la mig ni mi snang zhing / /rna ba dang ni sna yang min/ /lce dang lus dang yid kyang ni/ /de phyir

de yi yul ma yin/ /gzugs min sgra yang ma yin te/ /dri dang ro dang reg ma yin/ /dbang po ma yin rnam shes min/ /thams cad du ni rtag tu zhi/ /yul can dang ni yul de dag /rnam par brtags pas yod ma yin/ /yul can yod pa ma yin pas/ /

yul rnams srid pa ma yin no/ /byis pas ji ltar brtags pa bzhin/ /de ltar gang tshe yod min pa/ /de tshe mgon po yod 'gyur te/ /rnam par ma brtags tshul du'o/ /de ni kun tu thams cad la/ /bsam pa ji bzhin rdzogs mdzad pa/ /ston pa yid

bzhin nor bu ltar/ /kun gyi mdun na bzhugs pa yin/ /gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i tshul gyis su/ /ting 'dzin dbang sgyur rnams la ni/ /lta smra 'bel gtam thams cad kyis/ /kun gyi longs spyod 'os su 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad mgon mthong nas/ /

de tshe kun gyis ting 'dzin dang / /gzungs dang rig dang rnam par thar/ /bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad thob/ /gzungs la dbang ni thob gyur cing / /sangs rgyas ye shes tshol byed pa/ /bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang / /phyogs bcu dag nas lags pa yin/

yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzungs/ /de ni gzungs kyi mchog yin te/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs yang dag par/ /de ni bdag cag thob par shog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sngon gyi

mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang / de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis gang yin pa la 'jug go /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid yongs su shes

pas lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po

gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa dag kyang mkhyen nas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/

skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par

zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi khams mtshams sbyor ba'i bkod pa

thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / stong thams cad dang / stong gnyis pa thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos thams

cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gtan la phab pa thams cad dang / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna tshogs dang / re

ba sna tshogs dang / 'dod pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa sna tshogs kyi tshul rnam par gnas pa dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / ljongs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dag

sgra dang tshig brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa sna tshogs rnams kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag par ston cing / rang gi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las

byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa dang / bstan pa

nas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyis yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje chen po'i snying po dang / rdo rje chen

po'i 'od 'phro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa dang / gsang sngags rnam par dag pa'i sgos rdo rje'i khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba mdzad pa mthong ngo / /de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par

snang mdzad spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir thams cad du spros pa med pa'o/ /rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o/ /gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o/ /skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes

pa'o/ /bsam pa'i sa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o/ /tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad du sems can thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i sa

la byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad rjes su mthun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi

mdun na 'dug pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang chen po gos dri ma can gyis dkris pa lta bu 'di su'i yin/ 'di ci zhig ces sems can rnams kyis mi shes te ya mtshan ci zhig tu gyur to/ /gang dag blo gros rnam par dag pa yid gnyis dang the tsom dang bral ba/ sngon

gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags dang spyod pa'i tshul la byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang po/ /rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rnam par snang mdzad

chen po'i rgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la zhugs pa dag ste/ de dag ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'di mnyan pa dang bslab pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba dang / dngos grub

chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i skal ba yod do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan gyis gling bzhi pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du bdud pham par mdzad nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste/ mthar gyis spyad pa spyod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du byin gyis brlabs nas chos bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de yang bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song thams

cad spong ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi mdun du/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po

bris nas/ lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad do/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba

zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po/ bam po gnyis pa/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dpal yon tan gyi 'byung gnas na/ shing sA

la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu mthun pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i nags tshal chen po mchog na/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen

po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa

dbang chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa nyin gung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang / tshe dang ldan

pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa tshems chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa

mdzes dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len pa bar dwa dza dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung spyod dbang po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sbyor dang / tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srung dang /

tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs cig go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po sha stag la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon

nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa'

rtag tu brtson par chos la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rab tu brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag

pa'i bsam pas phan byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'

mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sang sang po'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dri ma med

pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla ma'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / thabs cig ste de dag

thams cad kyang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / dbang thob pa dang / sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du sems can

thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sngon gyi smon lam ci lta ba bzhin du nges par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /gnas

gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyang de nyid du 'dus te 'khod do/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bus kun nas bskor cing de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas

te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim dang / thags ris dang / zhing mchog dang / ba Ti dang / rnga chen dang / dus kyi 'khor lo can dang / dri ma med pa dang / tog dang / zla gdong dang / rnam par 'joms dang /

zab mo dang / stobs can dang / sgra gcan dang / tog dregs dang / rnam par snang ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sna tshogs phreng ba can dang / de dag la sogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan stong dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas

nas byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi mthu chen po dang / lha ma yin gyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / sil snyan dang /

pheg rdob rnams mngon par sprul nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ci ltar sprul

pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gtor to/ /gtor nas

kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i cod pan can dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po

dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyis rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po rna rdum dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma can dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dus can dang /

klu'i rgyal po rigs can dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gcig pa dang / klu'i rgyal po po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs ldan dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ klu'i mthu chen po dang /

klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos tsan+dan gor shi sha'i chu'i sprin mngon par sprul nas/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ lhags nas ci ltar sprul pa'i spos chu'i sprin rnams kyis shing sA la sna

tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug por char du mngon par phab bo/ /phab nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang /

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phags skyes po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang ba bzang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po

dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rmongs byed 'dzin chu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag pa brgya pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang / de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ me

tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnams thogs nas/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba

dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ ci ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams bcom ldan 'das

la gtor to/ /gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor mi 'am ci du ma dang ldan pa yang mi 'am ci'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /

na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnam pa du ma thogs pa brgya stong du ma rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan

'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ci ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob rnams bcom ldan 'das la

gtor to/ /gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnam par 'dud byed kyi bu dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'jigs 'gro dang / nam mkha' lding

gi dbang po 'dab brgya dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gtsug phud can 'khor nam mkha' lding brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /srin mo'i bdag po

khros bzhin dang / srin mo'i bdag po mche ba bzang dang / srin mo'i bdag po drag po dang / rab tu gtum pa dang / 'jigs 'jigs lta dang / skrag byed dang / 'jigs byed chen po dang / gdong bcu dang / gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i dril bu dang / rnam par 'jigs 'jigs lta dang / zla

ba'i sde 'khor srin po du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /drang

srong chen po me 'khor drang srong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu

'khod do/ /rlung sprin gyi phreng ba can dang / /rlung 'jig byed dang / rlung 'chags byed dang / rlung kun tu 'jog byed dang / rlung rnam par 'thor dang / rlung dus ldan dang / rlung rnam par 'thor rlung dang / rlung rlung dmar dang / rlung 'jig rten 'dzin dag kyang / bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /skar ma'i rgyal po zla ba 'khor skar ma brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la chen po sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /nyi ma 'od zer gyi phreng ba can dang / tsha bar byed pa dang / skems byed dang / du ba 'byin dang / rab 'bar dang / nyi ma sred byed 'khor lha'i

bu gzi brjid 'phags pa brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu

'khod do/ /klu'i rgyal po chu lha 'khor klu'i rgyal po du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te

phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs

gcig tu 'dug go/ /drag po kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang

shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /gza'i rgyal po chen po smin drug gi bu 'khor gza'

brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /sprin lha'i bu skya bo

zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu glog phreng zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu sprin gyi dra ba stug po 'joms byed ces bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'khor lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po

ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /glog stug byed ces bya ba dang / glog gzi brjid can zhes bya ba dang / glog stug 'od ces bya ba dang / glog

'od ces bya ba dang / glog mdzes phreng can zhes bya ba 'khor glog brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo

bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs ri dang / ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang / ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang / ri'i rgyal po mi mjed can

dang / /ri'i rgyal po rtse mo brgya pa dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang / ri'i rgyal po rig sngags 'chang dang / ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga

la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gshin rje dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / be con nag mo can dang / skyes bu nag po dang / 'chi bdag dang / dpal byin ma dang / rna nag

ma yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /dka' thub zlog ma dang / tsa

mu Na Da dang / drag po'i chung ma dang / tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / gzhon nu'i chung ma dang / lus ngan gyi chung ma dang / phag gi chung ma dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i chung ma yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug

po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /chu klung chen po gang gA dang / chu klung chen po si tA dang / chu klung chen po dbyangs can dang / chu klung chen

po bi da sta dang / chu klung chen po zla ba'i cha can dang / chu klung chen po ya mun na dang / chu klung chen po kun gyi bshes gnyen dang / chu klung chen po mgyogs ldan dang / chu klung chen po mtsho sten dang / chu klung chen po ba lang sbyin mchog ldan dang / chu klung

chen po brtse ba sbyin yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /dri za'i rgyal po

sna tshogs phreng ba can dang / dri za'i rgyal po 'phrog po dang / dri za'i rgyal po shugs chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po rnam par gnon pa dang / dri za'i rgyal po chu skyes dang / dri za'i rgyal po ut+pa la lta bu'i mig dang / dri za'i rgyal po tsan+dan brtsegs kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi

rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po

nye ba'i tog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rab gtum dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po bsnyems ldan dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po shugs 'chang dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po de dag dang / gzhan

nga 'khor rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs

gcig tu 'khod do/ /srin mo so can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo g.yengs byed ces bya ba dang / srin mo mtshan mo rgyu zhes bya ba dang / srin mo so 'cha' ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rmongs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rgod ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rdo rje lta bu'i lto zhes

bya ba dang / srin mo bum lto ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo zangs 'dab can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo glog lce ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo pun tsa le zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bong mo zhes bya ba dang / srin mo 'jigs su rung ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rdo rje lta bu'i sen mo

can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo chen mo de dag dang / gzhan yang srin mo 'khor du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'byung po'i rgyal po mdung can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gtun shing can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol 'dzin dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po

yang dag 'gugs byed dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gnya' drag 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong

ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /sha za thams cad dang / mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad dang / gnon po thams cad dang / grib gnon thams cad dang / thams cad dang / bdud

thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / stobs po che'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang / de dag thams cad shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom

la 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /srin mo bzhi gang yin pa de dag kyang phyogs bzhi nas lhags te gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag

'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po shin tu yangs shing tha gru che la ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur cing / sa gzhi rdo rje dang baiDUr+ya dang spug gi kha khyer gyis rnam par phye ba/ ngos

gnyis ka'i sgo khang dang rta babs dang skar khung gis brgyan te mdzes par byas pa steng du rin po che chen po'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/ mu tig gi do shal mang po dpyangs pa/ dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin

pa/ lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog gis sa phyogs de bkram par gyur te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug

po thams cad rdo rje chen po'i 'khor yug gi ris bskor ba rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams su gyur pa chu zheng dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa dus thams cad pa'i me tog gis legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas phyogs cha yongs su gang ba byang chub

sems dpa'i las kyis byung ba ste dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rgyal po'i gnas dag pa'i las kyis byung ba lham me lhang nge gnas pa de bzhin du shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus lhan ner rnam par

mdzes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung phyung ste/ rdo rje 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /dpa' bo chen po legs so legs/ /rdo rje 'byung gnas stobs po che/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni/ /

rdo rje stobs chen bsrung bar gyis/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHswa hA/ rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du rdo rje'i 'byung gnas kyi snying po

sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags par gyur te/ rdo rje 'byung gnas dpa' bo che/ /sems can kun la phan mdzad pa/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni/ /thub pa chen pos byin gyis rlobs/ /rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyang / /snying po 'di ni

'dzin gyur cig /des na 'dir ni de dag kun/ /tshul chen dngos grub thob par shog /ces grags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ kun tu bzang po dang byams pa dang / 'jam dpal

la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang rnam par dag pa'i sgo la 'jug pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags la 'jug pa gsang sngags kyi

sgo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i gnas rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ston pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta

bu 'phral du 'bras bu mang ba byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen byang chub sems dpas legs par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu mas rnam par rol pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas

thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi shes na/ sems can gzhan dag gis shes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba zhes bya ba gsang ba'i mchog yod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang thams cad

dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'di ni dus lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni tshod lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par ston pa bsgrub pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas sngon gyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo rdo rje chen po'i 'byung gnas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo

mtshar du gyur pa'i snying gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma ye shes skyid pa che/ /bsam gtan bde ba mchog thob pa/ /kun kyang de yi dbang du byas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar rtse gcig tu gyur par mkhyen

nas/ dpal be'u las byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo / /de byung nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas te/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal be'u nyid du zhugs so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa ston par smon lam btab nas gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste dbus kyi

'dzam bu'i gling mi mjed 'dir lcang lo can du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyi gnas na gnas pa de'i 'od zer gyi snang ba des snang bar gyur nas/ mig dang bzhin rgyas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis

mi khyab pa nyid yid la byed cing cang mi zer bar 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'od bar 'gyur ba'i brda mdzad de tshigs su bcad pa yang 'di gsungs so/ /sems can dag pa zla bzhin tshur gshegs shig /

de bzhin gshegs pas byin brlabs byang chub gzhol/ /bsam yas mnyam nyid legs rtogs khong chud khyod/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas byas gzo tshur shog cig /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la rtag gnas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje mchog tshur shog /phyogs

bcu dag na sangs rgyas ci snyed cig /sems can don mdzad bsam yas gzugs mnga' ba/ /de dag ma lus don gyi mdun 'gro khyod/ /gsang ba'i bdag po sems can mchog tshur shog /gsang ba'i dam pa sems can snying po tshur/ /gdul

dka' rtag 'dul dbang thob tshur shog cig /brtan te byung las skyes pa'o/ /dus dang tshod shes tshur shog cig /dam pa thob pa tshur shog cig /dam pa sbyin byed tshur shog cig /dpal byed dpal sdud dpal ldan pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sras tshur shog /

sems can bzang po stobs po che/ /rdo rje lta bur tshur shog cig /sangs rgyas sras po 'jigs med pa/ /stobs can rnams kyi mchog tshur shog /rtag tu srid pa gsum de yi/ /snying dga' byed pa tshur shog cig /yang dag lam ni ston byed pa/ /stobs

bcur gnas pa tshur shog cig /sems can dag pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /kun du bzang po tshur shog cig /kun du mdzes pa tshur shog cig /srid gsum dbang phyug tshur shog cig /khyod ni gzugs bzang shin tu brgyan/ /glang po rna ba khyod tshur shog /sna tshogs

gzugs can 'khrul med khyod/ /mthong na dga' ba tshur shog cig /'gro lding ba yi gzugs can tshur/ /tshur shog nA da ku be ra/ /rtag tu sna tshogs gos phreng 'chang / /cod pan mgul pa tshur shog cig /mi 'jigs thob par tshur shog cig /'jigs pa

'jigs pa tshur shog cig /sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyi shol ma byed tshur shog cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs nas 'ongs pa la 'jigs pa med pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsungs pa/ na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH

sarba ta tha gA te b+h+yaHsarba thA a bi sma ye bai sha ra d+ya mu khe b+ha ga ba ti badzra a ma li ni mA bi la~M ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'jigs pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags

kyi rgyal mo 'dis bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gnod sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag tshur shegs/ bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyis ni

bskor/ nyan thos brgya stong du mas ni bskor/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te shing

sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ba zhugs pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs de dag dang gnod

sbyin gzhon nu rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ sems can chen po bka' stsal pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la yang blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi

ba'i slad du/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der bzhud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de'i tshe rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa ston pa la snyoms par zhugs so/ /

byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba nor bu chen po'i ka ba bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zug pa/ sgo khang dang rta babs dang stegs bu du mas brgyan pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las shing sA la gcig pa lta bur byas pas rnam par spras pa mtha' mthar phug ron lta bu'i phreng gis mdzes par byas pa mu tig sna gnyis ka'i dra bas bres pa

rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas steng gi bar snang yongs su bskor ba lha'i ras bcos ma dang dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i sil snyan dang pheb rdo ba pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

glu len gar byed rol mo byed cing snyan par smra la gdu bu dang rna cha gdub 'khor gyis brgyan cing lha'i lus dang ldan pa rnams kyis gang ba/ rin po che chen po'i bla re kun du bres pas phyogs bai DUr+ya chen pos legs par spras pa/ ka tsa li di ka ltar reg na bde ba dus thams cad

pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa lha'i rin po che'i them skas kyi phreng gis rnam par spras pa/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'u dang / ne tsho dang / ri skegs dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / bya'i tshogs du ma sgra 'byin pa

dang / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / pad+ma dang / ka la ra ka dang / yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i rdzing byang chub sems dpas yongs su spyad par bya ba lha'i tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rdzab kyi rnyog pa can dag

gis kun nas mdzes par byas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sa brtol dang / sa brtol chen po'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab pa/ a ga ru nag po'i bdug pa'i sprin mang

pos khebs pas rnam par mdzes par byung bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi so so'i gnas bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du las kyis bskyed pa de dag mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re rer yang rin po che'i dbang

gi rgyal po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcu drug /rin po che'i rgyal po la sogs pa ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su spyad par bya ba sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dag bkod do/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi

rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng bas mdzes par byas so/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu yang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rnams sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyang baiDUr+ya chen po gsal ba'i rang bzhin

can te/ 'di lta ste dper na shin tu phyis pa'i me long ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba ste baiDUr+ya gsal ba'i phyir der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi

tshul du snang ngo / /dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po rin po che'i rgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprul to/ /sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi sprin dag khang pa brtsegs pa der kun nas rtag tu bab par mngon par

sprul te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho spyad pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos

mnyan pa'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin gzhon nu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos khang pa brtsegs pa de lag

pa gnyis kas blangs te steng gi bar snang las babs te/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ngo / /

khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'od kyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par snang bar gyur nas gang dag 'khor der 'dus shing 'khod pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang /

lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag snang ba des snang bar byas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas pa dang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba'i nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes par mthong

ngo / /mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis phan tshun rnam par bltas nas cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thob pa dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / stobs thob pa de dag gis kyang rnam par bltas

na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes par mthong nas de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nas

dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi steng gi bar snang la lham me lhan ne lhang nger gda' zhing bcom ldan 'das rtogs par dka' ba brjod par dka' ba 'di ni ci lags de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba de nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen

bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs te/ nga la mchod pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sngon gyi spyod pa bsgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa ste 'di ni

chos gang gi yon tan bskal pa brgyar yang mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa de'i 'od lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po de yang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun du

'dri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gi lan 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad du lha'i me

tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / pheg rdob pa'i sprin mngon par sprul te char du phab nas steng gi nam mkha' las babs te khang pa brtsegs pa de bcom

ldan 'das la phul lo/ /phul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs mkhyen pas/ /rnam dag brtul zhugs bzang po pa/ /rtog pa kun gyis rnam dag pa/ /phyag 'tshal sems can dag khyod la/ /mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang / /

sna dang de bzhin lce dang ni/ /lus dang de bzhin yid kyis ni/ /smra ba'i mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya yul can 'tshal ba yi/ /dngos po kun las rnam grol ba/ /rgyal ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdod nas zhi zhing

ma skyes pa/ /sku gsung thugs la sogs pa yis/ /gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten du/ /mnga' bdag khyod ni rtag tu dga'/ /khyod ni sems can srog ma lags/ /gang zag kun gzhi khyod ma lags/ /dus dang rang bzhin las ma byung / /ci ltar ma lags

ci ma lags/ /khyod ni brten nas byung ba tsam/ /sgyu ma lta bur dngos por spangs/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur ni/ /thugs su khyod chud rkang gnyis mchog /khyod ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /stong pa nyid kyang mchis ma lags/ /stong dang mi stong rnam par grol/ /

nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ g.yog 'khor dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das

kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dang bkod pa de dag dang sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa de dag las theg pa chen po'i thog ma'i spyod pa'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur

zhes grag ste/ gzod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med/ /chos nyid gcig tu dag pa ste/ /khyed cag the tsom dogs spongs la/ /kye ma'o 'di la brtson par gyis/ /theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni/ /sngon gyi spyod pa bla na med/ /spyod pa'i rgyal po skyid che ba/ /

kun gyis shin tu thob par gyis/ /sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams/ /yongs su dag pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /rtag tu 'di na mdzes la ltos/ /ston pa gang du'ang mi gnas la/ /gang du'ang spyod par mi gnas kyang / /gang dag spyod

pa rnams sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun la gnas par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang ni/ /rna ba de bzhin sna dang ni/ /lce dang de bzhin lus dang yang / /yid du snang ba ma lags so/ /dang po 'byung ba'i spyod pa ni/ /gang gi tshe na sbyangs gyur pa/ /de

tshe bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong / /ring ba ma lags nye ma lags/ /nang dang phyi ni ma lags te/ /rtag tu nam mkha' 'drar gnas pa/ /rnal 'byor pa ni chen po snang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu

bzang pos de ltar tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos ma thag tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal

te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa theg pa chen po la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig lags/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa de'i spyod pa ni ci lta bu zhig

lags spyod pa de rtogs par khong du chud pa ni su zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te sems can chen po legs so legs so/ /sems can chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa

la don 'di 'dri ba ni yang lags so/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i gnas bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid

kyi tshig so/ /de'i 'jug pa ni byang chub bo/ /rigs kyi bu gnas zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhi'o/ /de yang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ste sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas yul dang dus kyi dbang gis de'i rnam pa ston pa'o/ /rigs

kyi bu gzhan yang theg pa chen po ni rnam pa gnyis te 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba dang 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o/ /de la 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'o/ /'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i theg pa chen po nyid ni theg pa chen po'o/ /rigs kyi

bu gzhan yang 'dus byas ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu 'dus ma byas ni mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang stong pa nyid rang gi ngo bo'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po gang zhen stong pa nyid mngon

du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang dus kyi dbang gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste bya ba dang las kyis kun du bzung ste bya ba dang las kyis kun du bslang ba'i tshul gyis 'dogs pa ste rigs kyi bu 'di ni spyod pa'i

ngo bo'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la 'dus ma byas kyi theg pa chen po nyid gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ci ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig so/ /rigs kyi bu ci ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi tshig so/ /bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' gnyis la mi ltos pa de la gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid yang med do/ /gang la gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid yang med

pa de la spyod pa med do/ gang la spyod pa med pa de brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /gang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /gang dngos po thams cad dang bral ba de mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /gang mi 'khrugs pa de chos so/ /chos gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa

mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bden pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu bden pa gang yin pa de yod pa'o/ /yod pa gang yin pa de ma yin pa'o/ /gang pa ma yin pa de yang dag pa'o/ /

yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do/ /chos nyid gang yin pa de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ /gang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ye shes so/ /ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa

de btags pa'o/ /btags pa gang yin pa de rtog pa'o/ /rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzob ces bstan te/ /kun rdzob yod pas spyod pa btags so/ /btags pa yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung

ba ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud bzhi pham par byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la thug pa'i bar dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba

dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa 'jig rten du kun du ston to/ /rigs kyi bu de la sogs pa dus dang yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung nas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas te/ thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul rnams kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de ni yang

dag pa'i phul yin te theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba yul gcig yang dag par thob par byed pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni gdags pa'am rnam par

rig pa med cing mi dmigs te/ ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ni spyod pa yang med mi spyod pa yang med bslab pa yang med bslab pa yang med bslab pa ma yin pa yang med do/ /'dul ba yang med 'dul ba ma yin pa yang med do/ /de la ni lus sam ngag gam yid

kyi 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa mi dmigs so/ /de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'am/ nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ chos zhes bya ba 'am/ dge 'dun

zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ klu zhes bya ba 'am/ gnod sbyin zhes bya ba 'am/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram/ yod ces bya ba 'am/

med ces bya ba 'am/ bsod nams zhes bya ba 'am/ bsod nams ma yin zhes bya ba 'am/ 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba 'am/ thar pa zhes bya ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu de la ni dus zhes bya ba

'am/ tshod ces bya ba 'am/ skad cig ces bya ba 'am/ yud tsam zhes bya ba 'am/ thang cig ces bya ba med do/ /de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba 'am/ skar ma zhes bya ba 'am/ nyi ma zhes bya ba 'am/ me zhes bya ba 'am/ rlung zhes bya ba 'am/

chu zhes bya ba 'am/ sa zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am/ nyin mo zhes bya ba 'am/ dus tshigs zhes bya ba 'am/ lo khyud 'khor zhes bya ba 'am/ zla ba zhes bya ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na rtog pas brtags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi

mthar ltung ba ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtags pa'i sgo ci snyed pa de dag thams cad ni de la mi 'byung zhing med de de mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te de la gnyis su mi 'byung ngo / /rigs

kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' gnyis pa ma skyes pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams ni gnyis su med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyis su med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams su bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyod pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/ /bslab pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o/ /

thob pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob pa'o/ /rtsom pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsom pa'o/ /'dul ba ma yin pa de ni 'dul ba'o/ /gdags su med pa ni 'dogs pa'o/ /mthong ba med pa ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o/ /bsnyen

bkur mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o/ /mi nyan pa ni chos nyan pa'o/ /khong du chud pa med pa ni khong du chud pa'o/ /'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba'o/ /gnas pa med pa ni gnas so/ /stong pa nyid ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
