bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can du 'gyur ro/ /de dag khyim spangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal

gzhan yang sems can gang dag bdag gi bsngags pa brjod cing phrag dog gis gzhan dag la mi snyan par rjod pa yod de/ bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa'i sems can de dag ngan song gsum po dag tu lo stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag

lo stong phrag du ma 'das nas de nas shi 'phos nas ba lang dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ lcug lcag dang / dbyug lcag rnams kyis brdeg pa dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas lus nyen pa dang /

khal chen po bkal te lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te brgya la mi'i skye ba rnyed na yang rtag tu rigs dma' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bran du 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ dbang po rno bar 'gyur/ mkhas pa dang / gsal ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / dge ba yongs

su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur/ bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i chu klung skems par 'gyur/ skye ba dang / rga shi

dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag phra ma la mngon par dga' zhing sems can gang dag phan tshun 'thab

pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par byed du 'jug pa dag yod de/ sems can de dag rnam par rtsod pa'i sems su gyur pas lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed do/ /gcig la gcig phan pa ma yin pa 'dod cing rtag tu phan

tshun gnod par bya ba'i phyir brtson te/ de dag nags tshal gyi lha dang / shing gi lha dang / ri'i lha 'gugs par byed/ dur khrod rnams su 'byung po tha dad pa dag 'gugs par byed/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod cing sha dang

khrag za ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams mchod par byed de/ dgra bo de'i ming nas brjod pa'am/ gzugs byas nas der rig sngags drag po sgrub cing / byad stems dang / ro langs kyi sbyor bas srog gi bar chad bya ba dang / lus rnam par gzhig par

'dod pa la gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag la gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus te/ de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gnod pa'i sems

med pa'i sems su gnas par 'gyur/ rang rang gi bdog pas chog shes par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/

rigs kyi bu mo gang dag yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas te/ lo gcig gam/ zla ba gsum du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 'dzin cing gang dag gis bsam pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nub phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med

bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar shog shig ces smon lam de lta bu btab pa dag las/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad rdzu

'phrul gyis lhags nas lam ston par 'gyur te/ de dag der pad+ma tshon kha dog sna tshogs rnams las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la dag lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni der skyes nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de zad par mi 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi

'gyur ro/ /de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig rten 'dir gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du na yang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i

khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba mang po 'byor pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang

phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpa' ba dang / rtul phod pa dang / tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos shing bzung ba de'i bud

med kyi dngos po de tha ma yin par shes par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'chad pa dang / gzhan

dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / glegs bam la bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rnams kyis bkur sti bgyid pa'i dad pa'i rigs

kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /tha na rmi lam du yangs ngas rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i

gos rnams kyis dkris te phyogs gtsang mar bzhag na/ gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od

de'i mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'gyur/ sus kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus te/ phrogs na yang slar 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal

de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /'jam dpal dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs bya/ nyin zhag bdun du 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i

bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bya/ kha zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lus legs par bkrus te/ gos bzang po dri ma med pa bgo zhing phyogs gtsang mar me tog sna tshogs sil ma bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan

sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i sa phyogs su dri ma med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems su bya/ rol mo'i sgra dang / sil

snyan dang / glu dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la bskor ba byas te/ de'i sngon gyi smon lam yang yid la bya zhing mdo 'di yang bstan na gang bsams pa dang / gang smon pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gal te tshe ring

bar smon na ni tshe ring por 'gyur ro/ /gal te longs spyod dang ldan par smon na ni longs spyod 'byor par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dbang phyug dang ldan par smon na ni tshegs chung dus rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bu 'dod na na ni bu rnyid par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag sdig pa can gyi rmi

lam rmis sam/ gang du bya khwa ta dang / ltas ngan pa mthong ngam/ gnas gang du bkra mi shis pa brgya dag gnas par gyur pa la/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkur sti byed na rmi lam ngan

pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang / chus 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / g.yang sas 'jigs pa dang / glang po che gtum pos

'jigs pa dang / seng ges 'jigs pa dang / stag gis 'jigs pa dang / dom dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug pas 'jigs pa dang / sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / rkang lag brgya pas 'jigs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas na 'jigs pa

thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / rkun pos 'jigs pa dang / chom pos 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa bya'o/ /'jam dpal

gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'dzin cing / lha gzhan mi 'dzin pa dang / gang dag yang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag 'dzin pa dang / gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi bcu po dag 'dzin

pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bzhi brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang / khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi nyis brgya lnga bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang / dge slong ma gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang /

gang dag ji ltar yongs su bzung ba'i bslab pa'i sdom pa de dag gi nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig las nyams par gyur te/ ngan 'gro ngan song gis 'jigs skrag pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna

tshogs byed na/ de dag la ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o/ /bud med gang la la bu btsa' ba'i dus na sdug bsngal ma rungs pa drag po mi bzad pa myong ba des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod na/ de myur du

yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ bu yang yan lag yongs su tshang bar btsa' zhing gzugs bzang ba dang / mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / nad med cing gnod pa nyung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la mi ma yin pas mdangs 'phrog par

mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang gi phyir nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i yon tan brjod par khyod dad dam yid ches sam/ yang na khyod sangs rgyas kyi spyod

yul zab mo 'di la yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tshom za ba med dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pas

gsungs pa'i chos rnams la yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tsom 'tshal ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba'i slad du'o/ bcom ldan 'das

gdugs dang dgung zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis ni dogs la ltung yang gda'/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni gnas nas 'pho yang gda'i/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' ni gzhan du mi 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags

kyis kyang sems can dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dag mchis te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'di thos nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'di dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar shin tu yon tan dang / phan yon du

'gyur snyam nas de dag mi dad cing yid mi ches te/ spong bas yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi sman pa dang / mi bde ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du

grag par gyur pa de ngan 'gro ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni gnas med de go skabs ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka' ba'o/ /kun dga' bo khyod dad cing yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu

yin par blta'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ma gtogs par 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo mir 'gyur ba rnyed pa ni rnyed par dka'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la

dad cing gus pa yang rnyed par dka'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa yang rnyed par shin tu dka'o/ /kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang tshad med do/ /thabs

mkhas pa yang tshad med do/ /smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang tshad med do/ /nga de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par rgya cher yang dag par bshad par 'dod kyang bskal pa zad par 'gyur gyi/ bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mtha' rtogs par ni mi 'gyur ro/ /yang de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyabs grol zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa

gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus na/ sems

can bro nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir te/ yun ring po'i bro nad kyis lus kyi sha bas shing / bkres pa dang skom pas gre ba dang / mchu ni skams/ 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs/ mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams

du ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong / gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te/ de'i lus 'di na nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing / mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gang

lags pa des ni des dge ba dang / mi dge ba bgyis pa de thams cad legs par yi ger bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes de la dris shing brtags nas dge ba'am/ mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo

ba las/ gang dag nad pa de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la skyabs su mchi zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyid na/ de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyis 'tshal ba'i gnas

der mchis te/ yang na ni gdugs bdun/ yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig /yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/ yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la/ de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing dran pa rnyed la/ de dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi

rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur te srog gi slad du yang / sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/ /de lta lags pas dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ byang

chub sems dpa' skyabs grol la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la/ ji ltar mchod par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nad chen

po las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis nad pa de'i don du/ nyin bdun mtshan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong gi sdom pa blang bar bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang / skom rnams dang / yo byad thams cad kyis ci nus su mchod pa dang /

rim gro bya'o/ /nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan yid la bya'o/ /mdo 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu gdon par bya'o/ /zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me bud par bya'o/ /sku gzugs

bdun bya'o/ /sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar yang mar me bdun bdun gzhag go/ /mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du byas te/ ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o/ /

btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la/ nad kyi gnod pa'am/ rang gi dmag tshogs sam/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa'am/ rgyu skar gyi gnod pa'am/ gza'

zla ba'i gnod pa'am/ gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa'am/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char gyi gnod pa'am/ than pa'i gnod pa yang rung ste/ gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo

nas dbang bskur ba des/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya/ btson du bzung ba rnams gtang bar bya zhing gong du smos pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la de lta bur mchod pa byas na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs

spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis yul bde ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur/ rlung dang char dus su ldang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur/

yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang nad med pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ /yul der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ltas

ngan pa thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub sems

dpa' skyabs grol la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu ji ltar na tshe yongs su zad nas yang mngon par skye/ byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu yod par/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las

ma thos sam/ de'i phyir/ sngags dang sman gyi sbyor ba rnams bstan to/ /sems can nad kyis btab la/ de nad tshabs mi ches kyang sman dang rim gro byed pa dang mi ldan nam/ yang na sman pa sman ma yin pa byed pa yang yod de/ 'di

ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang po'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba gnyis pa ni/ gang dag rgyal po'i chad pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba gsum pa ni/ gang dag ha cang bag med de bag med par gnas pa de dag la

mi ma yin pa dag gis mdangs 'phrog pa'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzhi pa ni/ gang dag mes tshig ste/ 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba lnga pa ni/ gang dag chus 'chi ba'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba drug pa ni/

gang dag seng ge dang / stag dang / wa dang / sbrul dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i nang du chud de 'chi ba'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba bdun pa ni/ gang dag ri kha nas g.yang du lhung ba'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad pa ni/ gang dag dug

dang / byad dang / ro langs kyi sbyor bas gsod pa'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu pa ni/ gang dag zas dang skom ma rnyed nas bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/ /mdor na 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas

dus ma yin par 'chi ba chen por bstan pa ste/ gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni grangs med dpag tu med do/ /de nas 'khor der gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis 'dus par gyur te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs dang / gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde

dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin

dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po de dag go/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po re re la yang / g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum bdun 'bum yod pa ste/ de dag gis tshig gcig tu

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la yang ngan 'gror mchi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

des na bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du spro

bar bgyi'o/ /bye brag tu ni grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang / gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim

gro bgyid pa'i sems can de dag la bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin

gyi sde dpon chen po de dag la/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag gang gi phyir khyed/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dran la/ sems can thams cad la phan

pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba

btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing / re ba

thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyis dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang

chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA
na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta bai DUr+ya pra b+ha nA ma ba la d+ha na sa mA d+hi d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis

sangs rgyas kyi zhing bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so/ /lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / me tog gi char dpag tu med pa bab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa bdun po 'khor dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni bskor/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pa stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs su gsol/ sems can rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / nad thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba dang / re ba thams cad bskang du gsol/

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so

legs so/ /legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa gser dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba ltar rab tu bsil byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po spobs pa brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blta na mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa legs par rnam par sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po

brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po chen po'i rtse 'dzin rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa dgra bcom pa shA ri'i bu dang /

maud gal gyi bu chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i dge bsnyen chen po dpal tshangs pa dang brgya byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i dge bsnyen chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi dge

bsnyen chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsung dbyangs gcig gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pra ti ha ta/ b+hai Sha dz+ye rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ta thA

ga ta hU~M/ g+hu me g+hu me/ i mi ni mi hi/ ma ti ma ti/ sap+ta ta thA ga ta/ sa mA d+h+ya d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ti ma te pA le pA paM sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA paM nA sha ya/ ma ma bud+d+he/ bud+d+ho t+ta me/ u me ku me/ bud d+ha k+She tra pa ri sho d+ha ni/ d+ha me ni d+ha me/ me ru me ru/ me ru shi kha

re/ sarba a kA la mr-i t+yu ni bA ra Ni/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te na/ rak+Sha n+tu me/ sarba de ba sa me/ a sa me/ sa ma n+wA ha ran+tu me/ sarba bud d+ha/ bo d+hi satwA/ sha me sha me/ pra sha man+tu me/ sarbe t+yu pa drA ba/ byA d+ha yaH/ pu ra Ni/ su pUr Ni/

pU ra ya me/ sarba A shA me/ bai DUr+ya pra ti b+hA se/ sarba pA paM k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ oM b+hai Sha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ye/ ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye/ sa mut+ga te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa'i tshe snang ba chen po byung ste/ sa chen po yang g.yos nas

rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dag snang ngo / /'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang spos dang bdug pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ lan bdun du bskor ba byas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun

po de dag mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa des gtsang

mar byas te/ phyogs gtsang mar 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas la/ sems can thams cad la snying rje bas sa ga la bab pa'i nya nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku gzugs byas la tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang lnga la smyung bar gnas

pas gzungs 'di dag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'am/ stong rtsa brgyad dam/ stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu 'don cing me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / mar me dang / phreng ba dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan

gsum du mchod pa byed na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sems par 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / klu'i dge bsnyen chen po dag gis kyang yongs su skyong bar 'gyur/

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad kyis mi btab par 'gyur/ ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba

thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/ ci bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs

su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi gzungs zhes bya bar zung shig /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thag cing sbyong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang

zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi

stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI baM ka ra shri dz+nyA na dang /
dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas tho ling gser khang du/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @##/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM b+hai Sha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ye/ ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye/ b+hai Sha dz+ye sa mut+ga te swA hA/ sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa rdzogs so/ /

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ma Ni bi pu la bi mA na su pra tiSh+Thi ta gu h+ya ba ra ma ra ha s+ya da kalpa/ rA dzA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i

rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par mdzad/ dpyod pa pa dang /

kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa thams cad dang / mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyang btul nas pham par mdzad de/ 'khor ba'i skyon 'khor ba'i chu bo'i pha rol du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g.yog bdud kyi sde phrag

dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling bkang ba de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas sems can de dag gis 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra yang ma thos shing mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogs su bab par

gyur to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i dbus de'i sa de yang rdol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa/ sdong bu ni bai DUr+ya/ snying po ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ ze ba ni rdo'i snying po/ srid ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar la thug pa 'od

dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad du snang bar byas so/ /de nas pad+ma de las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyis bskul ba'i sgra 'di byung ngo / /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa thams cad la

phyag 'tshal lo/ o~M ma Ni badzra hr-i da ya/ badzra mA ra sai n+ya bi dra ba Ni/ ha na ha na/ badzra gar+b+he/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ sarba mA ra b+hu ba na ni hU~M hU~M/ saM d+ha ra saM d+ha ra/ bud+d+ha mai tri sarba ta thA ga ta badzra kalpa a d+hi Sh+Thi te swA hA/ pad+ma de las yang legs so zhes bya ba'i

sgra grag ste/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgras bkang nas/ shAkya thub pa srid pa'i dgon pa las ni rgal/ bdud ni bcom/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul ni spangs/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs ni dral/ chos kyi

sgron ma chen po ni spar te/ gang gi phyir gzungs 'di'i mthus sa gzhi rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ bdud ni bcom pa legs so legs so/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spu zing zhes byed cing lus 'dar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rig sngags chen mo 'di 'dus pa dang po la 'dzam bu'i gling du byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di 'jig rten du sngon byung bar

ma thos lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen

po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa 'di yang me tog sna tshogs su gyur te 'bab bo/ /gzungs 'di'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nas srog chags bye ba btul to/ /'di'i mthus sum mdo'i dbus su pad+ma

'di byung bar gyur to/ /lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di med par mngon/ ra rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus/ bdud bye ba pham par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems par ma yin te/ chos kyi sgron ma sbar bar mi nus so/ /lag na rdo rje ngas dka' ba bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma spyad na ji srid ngas gzungs 'di mnyan pa dang / mngon par brtson pas brtson 'grus ma byas kyi bar du ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob par ma nus kyi/ phyis ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob bo/ /lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba

yin no/ /lag na rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa yin no/ /lag na rdo rje 'di'i ming bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /brjod

cing bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes me tog sna tshogs dang / dri dang / bdug

pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na yon tan gyi

khyad par ci 'dra ba dag gda' ba bstan du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag pa'i chos kyi gzhi 'di dag las gzhan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyi tshogs bsags par mi bgyi lags so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje sems can de dag ni snyom las can/ brtson 'grus dman pa/ gti mug gis rmongs pa/ 'dod pa'i dregs pas rmongs pa/ yid ches par dka' ba/

phar mi 'dzin pa dang / mar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ste/ des ni gzungs 'di lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhing / bsod nams chung ba/ skal ba chung ba/ blo zhan pa rnams

kyis kyang nyan par mi 'gyur/ 'chad par mi 'gyur zhing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di la dad pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje

la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu nga ni 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba

grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'i ra ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / skye bo'i tshogs thams

cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nyid snang zhing nor bu dang / gser 'bar ba'i mgo rgyan sna tshogs kyis mgo brgyan pa/ lha'i gzugs can/ mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/ bshes gnyen thams cad dang ldan pa/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud

pa/ snang ba yod par 'gro'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyal po nor bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ blon po bye ba phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing btsun mo dam pa gsal byed ma zhes bya ba bud med nyi khri'i 'khor can lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi lus

la 'gran pa zhig yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na yang me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / drang chu'i shing dang / dri'i shing gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no/ /chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams

cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no/ /thang las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rang bzhin no/ /mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri thub ste/ thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ sangs

rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa yin no/ /rgyal po de yang chos dang mthun pas rgyal srid skyong bar byed kyis chos dang mi mthun pas ni ma yin te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa can yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na yang

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang chen po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas sangs rgyas kyi

mdzad pa mdzad de de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gser gyi kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis kun nas bskor ba/ 'od rin po che sna bdun ltar shin tu gsal ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag

thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi lus 'od 'phro ba/ mtshan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma'i stan la 'khod pa ste/ thams cad kyang spobs pa mi zad pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pas 'di lta ste/

nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sems shing gzungs de nyid kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par 'di byung bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yang gzungs 'di sems can thams cad la rab tu ston to/ /sems

can de rnams kyang gzungs 'di'i mthus bde ba nyams su myong ba ste/ sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams las yongs su thar bar gyur to/ /ngan song gi

sgo thams cad kyang bcad par gyur to/ /mtho ris kyi sgo rnams phye'o/ /bde 'gro'i sgo rnams thams cad kyang phye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so/ /

'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ chu dang 'o ma gcig tu gyur pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu

gnas pa'i gsang ba 'di sgrub pa na smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig ces smon lam btab

ste/ gang dag gzungs 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / 'don pa dang / sems pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / chung ngu na ming nyan par byed dam/ lag pas reg gam/ lus la 'chang nga ngam/

mig gis mthong ba tsam mam/ glegs bam la bris pa'am/ ras la bris pa'am/ rtsig pa la bris pa mthong na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa 'am/ shan

pa'am/ gdol pa'am/ rngon pa'am/ bya ba 'am/ long ba'am/ 'on pa'am/ sha bkra can nam/ bkren pa'am/ zhar ba'am/ sgur po'am/ dman pa'am/ sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i sgrib pa can nam/ myong bar gyur par ma nges pa'am/

bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa 'am/ lta ba ngan par lhung ba'am/ /log 'dren gyis zin pa'am/ rgyu skar dang / gza'i gnod par byas pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /chung ngu na dud

'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / bya dang / sbrang bu mchu dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / grog sbur rnams dang / gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs sgo nga las skyes pa'am/ mngal nas skyes pa'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa'am/

rdzus te skyes pa la sogs te/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor de

dag thams cad dga' zhing ba spu'i khung bu rnams g.yos par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu bab bo/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to/ /

'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi lus las kyang 'od zer byung bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ nyams dga' ba/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo

bzhi btod pa/ them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'od 'bar ba/ grwa bzhi na nor bu rin po che chen po bzhi nyi ma ltar 'od 'bar ba/ nor bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi dra ba du ma dpyangs pa/ dril bu mang pos mdzes par byas pa/ dar gyi ba dan mang pos kun nas

brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs du ma'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa zhig byung ngo / /sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul ldeg la sgra 'byin cing mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to/ /lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams

cad bskul to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bskul to/ /rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad kyang bskul te/ lha'i rigs thams cad kyang 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / bar chad byed pa'i log 'dren thams cad kyang dngangs skrag ste/

cho nges 'debs shing phyogs bcur byer ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas/ 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar byas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das de rnams bskul nas slar dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /

bcom ldan 'das khyod de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de gzigs pa dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing bzhud pa'i dus la bab kyi bzhud la nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas

pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de yang rgyas par gson cig /bcom ldan 'das gzungs de ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags so/ /gzungs de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags te/ gang la la zhig nyan tam/ chung ngu na

ming ngam/ lag pas reg na yang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas gshegs pa'i sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bkye ste/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de la bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu tshur sheg /de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byung ba ni 'di

yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan las bzhengs pa dang / khang pa brtsegs ma de'i dbus su rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri byung nas/ khri de'i steng du rin po che'i pad+ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ sdong bu ni gser/ pad+ma'i snying po ni mu tig

dmar po can zhig byung ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu sa chen po 'di che thang du g.yos par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu chen po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor thams cad

dbugs phyung nas steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khod de/ 'khor mang po dang / 'khod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang / rnam par sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'khor dang / lha dang /

klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po dang / rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang po'i 'khor dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs

cig tu/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gshegs so/ /de dag thams cad shar phyogs logs su dong ba dang / tshad med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong 'das nas nor bu sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/ /'jig rten gyi khams der byon ma thag tu nam mkha' las babs nas/

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de'i drung du gshegs so/ /der gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa mi mang 'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsungs nas/ rin po che sna bdun

gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa zhig byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa dang / des phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ zab cing zab pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya

thub pa de yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ khang pa brtsegs ma de nyid du bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor lags sam/ khyod kyis bdud dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom pa lags

sam/ khyod kyis chos kyi sgron ma sbar lags sam/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng lags sam/ chos kyi rnga brdungs lags sam/ chos kyi dung rab tu bus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung ba bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa

mkhyen par bgyis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis deng 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo chos kyi gter lan gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba mdzod cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi

khams de thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu

chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/ me tog gi char chen po yang rab tu 'bab/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang snang / sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin/ steng gi nam mkha'i bar snang gi lha'i bu rnams kyang lha'i sil snyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba/ yan lag

lnga pa dag dkrol bar byed/ klu chen po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed/ dri'i phye ma sna tshogs dang / tsan+dan gyi chu sna tshogs kyi char yang 'bebs par byed/ gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi

char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par snang byed dang / nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / chu shel dang / me shel dang / dpal gyi snying po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i me

tog u t+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i me tog dang / lha'i dngul las byung ba'i me tog gi char yang rab tu 'bebs par

byed/ lha'i me tog gi phreng ba'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang a la la zhes sgra snyan par 'byin cing dbyangs kyang rjes su sgrogs par byed/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par byed/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya

thub pa 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i rgyal po'i cho

ga zhib mo chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu spyod par bgyis pa legs so legs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra bar ba gnas gtsang ma'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer sna tshogs bkye ste/ 'od

zer de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bskul zhing snang bar mdzad do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang snang bar mdzad/ lha'i gnas thams cad

dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams su yang bskul cing snang bar mdzad nas/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la lan gsum/

bskor ba byas nas slar yang gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs so/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad nas/ tshad med pa'i gang

gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma dag sprul nas/ khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i seng ge'i

khri dag byung ba de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi 'khor dang / khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad

yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos legs par mchod nas rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab

gnas gtsang ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po yang rab tu gda'/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po

dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa'i 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyang rab tu gda'/ rigs sngags 'chang gi tshogs 'dus pa chen po yang lhags nas/ 'di

lta ste/ lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyang lhags/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang gda' lags pas bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i dus ni 'di

lags so/ /tshong ni 'di lags so zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu song la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsol ba thob cig dang / des khyod la rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba 'di/ sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu bstan du gsol/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po song la 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus kyis phyogs su rdo rjes sa la bsnun cig /de nas gsang

ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ 'khor gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba der song nas sa phyogs de la rdo rjes bsnun te sa la bsnun ma thag tu de nas gru bzhir gas so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /g.yos ma thag tu sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma gru bzhi pa/ ka ba bzhi pa zug pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ mnyam pa/ nyams dga' ba/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ chas mdzes par byas pa/

bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ 'od 'bar ba/ them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod la/ rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo / /khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus der yang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang / rin po che dang /

mu tig gi dra ba du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ dril bu du ma 'phyang du bcug pa/ dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi chun po du mas mngon par brgyan pa zhig byung ngo / /mchod rten de'i dbus na

de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis khang pa brtsegs ma de dag la mchod pa mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de yang khang pa brtsegs ma de dang mchod rten la mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ me

tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /

lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar skyes te ya mtshan du gyur/ spro bar gyur nas khang pa brtsegs ma dang / mchod rten 'di ci'i phyir byung bar gyur ces ca co dang gzha'i sgra mthon

por 'byin cing mchod rten dang / khang pa brtsegs ma de la bskor ba byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod par byed do/ /byang chub sems

dpa' de dag thams cad dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang / thal mo sbyar nas 'khod de phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /de nas khang pa brtsegs ma de las sgra byung ba/ kye 'khor mang po dag bar snang la ci snang ltos shig ltos shig /de nas ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor

mang po de dag thams cad kyis bar snang la bltas te bltas ma thag tu bai DUr+ya dang / nor bu rin po che chen po las byung ba'i sprin gyi phung po chen po zhig byung ngo / /de nas sprin gyi phung po'i steng du nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs

'di yi ge gser gyi kha dog tu bris pa mthong ngo / /nam mkha'i dkyil de nyid nas sgra byung ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklag tu gsol ba klag tu gsol/ sgra byung

ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar sprin gyi phung po las bris pa byung nas 'di skad ces kyang dbyangs su sgrogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod rten mchog 'di sgo phye shig dang / mchod rten de'i dbus na de bzhin

gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs te/ de'i mthus cho 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i khyad par chen po 'di snang zhing / de kho na'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yang snang / nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas

pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad dang bcas pa mtha' dag rdzogs shing rgyas par 'khor gyi dbus su legs par rab tu 'chang par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rin po che 'di dang 'di na bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal po me tog rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rnam par bkra ba dang / rdo rje 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de dag bstan pa'i skabs dbye bar mdzod cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rdzu 'phrul

gyi cho 'phrul chen pos khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gang na bar bzhud de/ phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can/ bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa brkyang nas mchod rten mchog de'i sgo'i sgo 'phar phye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams bstan to/ /de

nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa legs so legs so/ /deng khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor to/ /bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'di nyid la bzhugs

shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchod rten gyi nang du khri de nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag khang pa brtsegs

ma'i mchod rten gyi nang du ci'i slad du byung gang nas gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje sngon byung ba bskal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ gzhal gyis mi lang ba/

tshad gzung du med pa/ ches grangs med pa na gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa/ rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang zhing ma rmos pa ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu byung ste/ bdag gi ba med cing yongs su bzung

ba med de/ 'jig rten thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas med do/ /de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba de la drang srong gsum zhig gnas te/ gcig gi ming ni nor bu'i gtsug tor/ gnyis pa ni gser gyi gtsug tor/ gsum pa ni

rdo rje'i gtsug tor zhes bya ste/ de rnams bdag cag ji ltar sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur snyam zhing gcig tu sangs rgyas yid la byed/ chos yid la byed/

dge 'dun yid la byed do/ /de nas drang srong de rnams de snyam du bsams nas yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar gyur cing sems pa na/ de rnams kyis sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i byams pa/ rnam par bkra ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing /

lha'i mig skyes nas ji tsam na steng du bltas na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bar snang la sgra 'byin pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so/ /khyod 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni legs so/ /kye skyes

bu dam pa dag nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du gsungs pa thos pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi

bar thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ bdud thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi sgron ma sbar bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa

drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi chos rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /

smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba thob nas phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na sems can gang dag par mi 'dzin pa dang / mar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa

dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / mi dge ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bslu ba dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga

byed pa dang / bram ze gsod pa dang / ba lang gsod pa dang / chom rkun byed pa dang / g.yon can dang / sho gam sgugs pa dang / du smra ba dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par spyod pa dang / phra ma smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa smra ba dang / gzhal

ba la sgyu byed pa dang / gzhal lugs la sgyu byed pa dang / srang la sgyu byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa dang / gtams pa rnog pa dang / bshes pa la 'khu ba dang / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pas zin pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad gzungs

'di'i mthus thos pa tsam mam/ bklags pa'am/ kun chub par byas pa'am/ lus la thogs sam/ bris nas 'chang ngam/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la 'dogs sam/ glegs bam du byed dam/ ras la bris pa'am/ dar la bris pa'am/ rtsig pa la bris

pa'am/ ra ba la bris pa'am/ chung ngu na sgra nyan pa'am/ lag pas reg gam/ grib mas phog gam/ sems can gzhan gyis reg na yang de dag thams cad gdon mi za bar phyir mi ldog par gyur pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la yang yon tan brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ bdud thams cad mthar byed par

'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze thams cad

dga' bar 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ rtag tu lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / gzhon sha can du 'gyur/ tshig mnyen zhing snyan par 'gyur/ bkren par mi 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur/ lus

la dug gis mi tshugs te/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ me yis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ de la gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs te/ mi rgod kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ kla klo'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ lam dang

lam gol ba'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ 'byung po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ srin po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ srin po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ sha za'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pas ma yin te/ sbrul gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /

lus la rims kyis mi tshugs te/ zhag gcig pa'am/ zhag gnyis pa'am/ zhag gsum pa'am/ zhag bzhi pa'am/ rtag pa'i rims sam/ rims thams cad kyis lus la mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mig gi nad mi 'byung ste/ rna ba'i nad ma yin/

sna'i nad ma yin/ lce'i nad ma yin/ kha'i nad ma yin/ so'i nad ma yin/ mchu'i nad ma yin/ mgrin pa'i nad ma yin/ rna bar zug pa ma yin/ lag pa'i nad ma yin/ ro rgyab kyi nad ma yin/ chu so'i nad ma yin/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad ma yin/

gcin nad ma yin/ 'khru ba'i nad ma yin/ shu ba'i nad ma yin/ brla'i nad ma yin/ byin pa'i nad ma yin/ rkang pa'i nad ma yin/ nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /'di lta ste/ bas bldags dang / lhog pa dang / med pa la dang / lto na ba dang / g.yan

pa dang / phol mig dang / khyi rngo dang / mdze dang / rkang shu la sogs pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung / klad pa na ba ma yin/ gzhogs phyed na ba ma yin/ long bar mi 'gyur/ zhar bar mi 'gyur/ sgur po ma yin/ pha rol gyi mthus 'chi bar mi

'gyur/ 'on par mi 'gyur/ sha bkra can du mi 'gyur/ brnyas shing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i tshe na yang spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur/ sems 'khrugs pas dus byed par mi

'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal mngon du bstan nas dbugs 'byin pa mdzad par 'gyur/ lus la byad dang / g.yengs byed kyis mi tshugs/ lus la sngags kyi sbyor bas mi tshugs/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par

'gyur/ rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur te/ gsang ba'i gzungs kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu 'byung ngo zhes smra ba mthong ngo / /de

nas drang srong de rnams chos kyi dga' ba snying la reg cing spro ba thob nas mar sar gyi gong bu bzhu ba bzhin du lus zhig nas zhu ba'i khu ba de sa'i nang du thim mo/ /de nas sa gzhi de las smyug ma'i mde'u gser gyi kha dog can/ rtsa ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ lo ma gser

las byas pa/ rtse mo mu tig las byas pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ dri zhim pa/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba gsum skyes so/ /smyug ma'i mde'u de rnams zla ba bcu lon pa dang gas te/ de

rnams kyi dbus nas khye'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa gsum byung ngo / /de nas khye'u de rnams phyogs de nyid du de'i drung na skyil mo krung bcas te bsgom zhing 'khod do/ /ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin mo

byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gser gyi kha dog gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis kun nas spras par gyur to/ /smyug ma'i mde'u de rnams kyang khang pa brtsegs mar

gyur to/ /nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang nam mkha' la gser gyi yi ger snang ngo / /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang steng nas gdugs 'dzin cing me tog gis gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'jig rten du sangs

rgyas byung ngo zhes dbyangs su sgrogs shing 'di lta ste/ klu'i bdag po rgyal po chan po gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba dang / grul bum gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / brang 'gro'i bdag po rgyal po nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba dang / gnod sbyin

gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod pa byed do/ /sa phyogs de yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur to/ /me tog gi shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin du gyur to/ /

lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshe drang srong smyug ma'i mde'u rnams las byung ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lag na rdo rje de dag ni khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gyi de bzhin gshegs

pa 'di dag yin no/ /sa phyogs kyang 'di yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'di yin no/ /smyug ma'i mde'u yi khang pa brtsegs ma yang 'di yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa yang 'di yin no/ /de rnams drang srong du gyur pa na gzungs 'di

thos pa tsam mam/ snying po sems la bsgoms pa tsam gyis drang srong gi lus spangs nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi khyad par bsngags

pa smra ba gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar gyur to/ /lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba gang gis drang srong de rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de

rnams la bkur sti dang / rim gro byas pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab tu gnas pa 'di gnas gtsang ma

zhes bya ba'i rim gro bar gyur pa na/ de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi

rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di 'dra bas sngon gyi sbyor ba gsungs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang dag par bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa'i gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri la gshegs pa'i gsang

ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs pa'i

gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i gnas kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi 'od zer bye ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems

dpa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyan gyi gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la rab tu 'god pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rtogs pa khong du chud pa'i gsang ba/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par

byed pa'i gsang ba 'di gsungs pa legs so legs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gzigs nas/ 'od zer kha dog

sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog dag bkye ste/ de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su dong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing

thams cad snang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs so/ /'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i gsung

dbyangs chen pos bkang nas rig sngags chen mo 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta dI p+ta/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ma Ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ ri dang /

tshal dang / nags tshal du bcas pa'i sa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa khyod kyis mchog tu gsang ba 'di gsungs pa ni legs par gsungs te legs so legs

so/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i sprin chen po nam mkha'i dkyil du chags so/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi char bab bo/ /tsan+da na sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang bab bo/ /u dum+bA ra'i me

tog gi char bab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gzhan yang me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri ngad ldang ba dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / me tog mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes

chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / yid 'ong ba dang / pa ri Sha ka dang / me tog tsam pa ka'i char dag bab bo/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad skrag cing sngangs par gyur to/ /

bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi lus rdul cing lus dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros par brtsams so/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang dag yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin

dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phul lo/ /de nas nor bu rab snang sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su mchod pa byed do/ /de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ras bcos bu'i gos brgya stong gis

bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma me tog sna tshogs dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /

ba dan dag thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /tshangs pa la sogs te/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson par byed do/ /

de bzhin du sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /lha'i bu nyi ma dang / zla ba yang nam mkha'i dkyil nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed

do/ /dpal lha mo chen mo dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo dung can ma dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma yang 'khor brgya stong dang / lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma dang / rdo rje nag mo dang / me tog so dang / lha mo chen mo pho nya mo

dag kyang rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /dri za'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag kyang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa brgya stong bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pas dkrol bar byed do/ /klu'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag

du ma 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / chu lha dang / shin tu rab gnas dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam pa kun nas rdzogs pa'i 'od dag kyang rin po che nor bu skar 'od sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan

'das la mchod pa byed do/ /'khor chen po yang 'dus par gyur to/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po de yang blon po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / btsun mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas shing bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas yongs su

bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas so/ /sa de yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas 'khor chen po de nyid kyi dbus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la brtol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de'i steng du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las

byas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ lhag pa'i 'od 'phro ba/ nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba zhig byung ngo / /de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas nas/ 'khor lo de'i lte ba'i

nang nas sgra byung ba/ shAkya thub pa gang 'di 'dra ba'i gzungs kyi gsang ba rnams gsungs pa ni legs so legs so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ /byang chub chen po'i snying por gshegs pa'i rig sngags/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi rig sngags kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di/ bcom ldan 'das yang gsungs shig /nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs gsungs

shig dang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul cing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gsungs ba'i dus ni 'di

lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyi mtsho skems pa/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las nges par 'byin pa lags/ 'di ni chu bo chen po las sgrol ba lags te/

gzungs 'di ma mchis par sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi sa bon lags/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi sgron ma sbar ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba lags/

'di ni chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa lags/ 'di ni chos kyi rnga brdung ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi seng ge'i khri la mchis pa lags te/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor cho ga dang bcas pa/ gsang

ba dang bcas pa/ phyag rgya'i le'u dang bcas pa/ ras bcos bu zung dang bcas pa/ yo byad dang bcas pa'i cho ga legs par rgyas par gsungs shig /de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /

lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'khor 'dus pa rnams ya mtshan du gyur/ spro bar gyur nas thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas shing 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba yang

dag pa 'di dang / gsol ba btab pa gsan nas/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di rgyas par bka' stsal to/ /bskul ba'i le'u ste cho ga dang po'o// //'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba dam pa'i cho ga zhib

mo'i rgyal po/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sdig pa kun ni sel byed pa'i/ /rig sngags lus kyi dri ma med byed pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med pa yi/ /cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po dge bar bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M

bi pu la gar+b+he/ ma Ni pra b+he/ ta thA ga ta niR+de sha ne/ ma Ni ma Ni/ su pra b+he/ bi ma le/ sA ga ra gam+b+hI re/ hU~M hU~M/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ bud+d+ha bi lo ki te/ gu h+ya a d+hi Sh+Thi ta/ gar+b+he swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba

dam pa'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa nas chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rin po che'i char chen po bab par gyur to/ /me tog gi char chen po bab bo/ /'khor thams cad kyang 'dus te thams cad kyis ca co dang / gzha'i sgra phyung nas thams cad sa bcu la gnas

par gyur to/ /thams cad dge ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa gang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i gzungs 'di lta bu gsungs pa legs so legs so/ /thos

pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lha'i na bza' dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pas mchod par 'gyur ro/ /bklags pa tsam

gyi mdo la phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa/ bskal pa'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong

ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong du yang brjod par mi spyod de/ de ltar gzungs 'di phan yon che ba lags so/ /bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis bar chad bya bar mi nus te/ bgegs kyis bya bar ma yin/ phyir rgol bas ma yin/ mi mdza' bas ma yin/ 'byung pos ma

yin/ gdon gyis ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ mi dang mi ma yin pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du 'phel bar 'gyur/ lan cig dran pa tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan gyi phan yon mang por 'gyur na shin tu bya ba mang po

byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sems can de

rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /spro bar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de rnams la dbugs phyung ste/ ngas gzungs 'di gtad do/ /sems can de yang gtad do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di dang / sems
